name: A Child's Eyes
description:
Time to go do your chores!  Take out the trash, clean the dishes, and mop the floor in this exciting chore-simulator where there are absolutely no horrifying secrets whatsoever.  Just do as you are told and everything will be fine.

Controls:

Click and drag to move objects around and perform chores

Team:

Jacob Sharp

Brennan Crowder

Mia Sisul

David Jeffalone

This game was made for the TU Game Designers Spooky Jam

All assets were created by the development team
